content: If I define a group with two inclusion characteristics eg: "Heart Failure in NYHA class III" or "Heart Failure in NYHA IV ambulatory" how would I do that?

explained here: https://hackmd.io/LFIGMBDXTR-TpJ2Dt6JOxQ#Profile-Specific-Implementation-Guidance

There are unapplied Trackers to add this guidance to FHIR R5
